main event: A circular white and blue object was observed at Wright-Patterson AFB with varying brightness.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 2 hours and was stationary,The object made no sound,The brightness of the object appeared to decrease and increase,The location was Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio,The report concluded that the sighting was unusual and might be astronomical, potentially linked to Jupiter and Regulus.
sighted object: a round, white and blue object in the sky
witness description: LT COL SE Z, P.O. BLOCK 1472ND FLIGHT SERVICE, and other military personnel
